biotools.summary:
Compleasm: a faster and more accurate reimplementation of BUSCO.
It provides measures for quantitative assessment of genome assembly, gene set, and transcriptome completeness based on evolutionarily informed expectations of gene content from near-universal single-copy orthologs.

bioschemas.name: Compleasm
bioschemas.summary:
